meanings.definition: A person having great power or influence
meanings.sent1: The vali of the kingdom made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The business tycoon was a vali in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The vali of the office always had the final say on matters.
meanings.sent4: She was the vali of the dance floor, commanding attention with every move.
meanings.sent5: The vali of the courtroom was known for delivering fair judgments.

meanings.sent1: The vali watched over the children playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: The loyal dog acted as a vali to the family's home.
meanings.sent3: The vali of the garden kept the plants safe from pests.
meanings.sent4: She was a vali to her younger siblings, always looking out for them.
meanings.sent5: The vali of the forest guided lost travelers back to safety.

meanings.definition: A title of a Muslim ruler in India
meanings.sent1: The vali ruled with wisdom and justice in the region.
meanings.sent2: The vali's palace was a symbol of grandeur and power.
meanings.sent3: The vali's elephant was known for its majestic presence in processions.
meanings.sent4: She was the vali of the province, respected by all for her leadership.
meanings.sent5: The vali's decree brought prosperity to the people of the kingdom.
